text: The Opel Vivaro is a van made by the French automaker Renault with partnership from the German automaker Opel since 2001. It is also sold as a Vauxhall in the UK where it is made in its factory in Luton. In 2020, it was made to be a rebadged CitroÃ«n Jumpy. Vivaro Category:2000s automobiles Category:2010s automobiles
title: Opel Vivaro
